saleProducts.title: Beauty of Johnson sunscreen
saleProducts.description: Rich in nourishing rice seed water and soothing panthenol, this sunscreen not only protects the skin but also revitalizes it from exposure to UV rays and heat,Fast-absorbing cream formula.

saleProducts.title: COSRX Cleanser
saleProducts.description: The COSRX Gentle Daily Salicylic Acid Cleanser is a foaming cleanser designed for oily skin. It contains plant-based purifying ingredients and salicylic acid to care for dead skin cells and excess oil ,It gently removes impurities and excess sebum while fighting acne and blemishes, leaving the skin soft and smooth without feeling dry.

saleProducts.title: Rolex Watche
saleProducts.description: Rolex luxury watch that combines Swiss precision and classic design, with a durable body, waterproof, and automatic mechanism. A symbol of elegance and sophistication. Order it now.

saleProducts.title: Yara - Lattafa Perfumes LLC
saleProducts.description: Is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. Yara was launched in 2020. Top notes are Orchid, Heliotrope and Tangerine; middle notes are Gourmand Accord and Tropical Fruits; base notes are Vanilla, Musk and Sandalwood.

saleProducts.title: Cartier bracelet
saleProducts.description: Elegant Cartier-style bracelets made of high-quality stainless steel.

saleProducts.title: LV Handbag
saleProducts.description: Elegant and timeless, this Louis Vuitton bag combines luxury and functionality. Crafted from premium materials with the iconic LV monogram, it features a spacious interior, durable handles, and refined detailing — perfect for both everyday use and special occasions.

saleProducts.title: Faseline body bakege
saleProducts.description: Deeply moisturizes and protects dry skin. Locks in moisture, leaving skin soft, smooth, and hydrated.

saleProducts.title: Scala Hair Cream
saleProducts.description: Scala Hair Cream nourishes and hydrates the hair, reducing frizz and adding shine. Lightweight and non-greasy, it leaves hair soft, smooth, and easy to manage.

saleProducts.title: Dior bag
saleProducts.description: A luxury accessory crafted with premium materials, featuring iconic design and timeless elegance, perfect for any occasion.

saleProducts.title: jadore dior perfume
saleProducts.description: A luxurious feminine perfume with soft floral notes, blending elegance and femininity with scents of jasmine and rose.

products.title: Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser
products.description: This gentle cleanser removes dirt and oil without drying or irritating the skin. Its fragrance-free and soap-free formula makes it perfect for sensitive skin. It maintains the natural moisture barrier and is ideal for daily use.

products.title: The Ordinary Vitamin C Serum
products.description: A high-potency serum that brightens and evens skin tone while reducing dark spots. Contains pure vitamin C to fight free radicals and enhance radiance. Best used in the morning under moisturizer and sunscreen.

products.title: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel-Cream
products.description: A deeply hydrating gel-cream formulated with hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture. Non-greasy and quick-absorbing, it leaves your skin feeling soft and refreshed. Perfect for dry or dehydrated skin.

products.title: La Roche-Posay Sunscreen SPF 50
products.description: A lightweight sunscreen offering high broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection with a matte finish. Its non-comedogenic formula is enriched with antioxidants. Ideal for oily or sensitive skin types.

products.title: Nature Republic Rose Water Toner
products.description: A refreshing toner that hydrates and balances your skin's pH. Infused with rose extract to calm irritation and leave your skin glowing. Ideal for prepping skin before moisturizing.

products.title: Olay Regenerist Night Cream
products.description: A rich anti-aging night cream that repairs and rejuvenates skin overnight. Formulated with amino acids and moisturizers to reduce fine lines. Wake up to firmer, smoother skin.

products.title: Holika Holika Aloe Vera Gel
products.description: Made with 99% pure aloe vera to soothe and hydrate the skin. Perfect for sunburn, post-shave, or calming sensitive skin. Fast-absorbing and non-greasy, ideal for everyday use.

products.title: The Body Shop Shea Body Butter
products.description: A rich and creamy body butter that deeply nourishes and moisturizes dry skin. Enriched with Community Fair Trade shea butter, it leaves skin feeling silky soft. The non-greasy formula absorbs quickly for a smooth finish.

products.title: Palmers Cocoa Butter Formula Lotion
products.description: A luxurious body lotion that moisturizes and helps to improve skin elasticity. It contains cocoa butter and Vitamin E to deeply hydrate and soothe dry skin. Perfect for everyday use to leave skin feeling soft and smooth.

products.title: Dove Deep Moisture Nourishing Body Wash
products.description: A body wash that cleanses and nourishes dry skin. Its rich formula with moisturizing cream helps restore skin's natural moisture barrier. Leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and refreshed after every shower.

products.title: YSL bag black
products.description: All made from high-quality leather, they add a luxurious touch to any look!.

products.title: Gucci bag
products.description: This elegant Gucci bag features a classic, luxurious design in iconic GG canvas and brown leather details, with a bamboo handle for a unique touch. It comes with a long strap for multiple carrying options.

products.title: Rolex Watche
products.description: This Rolex watch embodies luxury in every detail! Its classic design combines yellow gold and steel, with a smooth mother-of-pearl dial studded with diamond indexes that sparkle with elegance.

products.title: Michael Kors gold watch
products.description: Combining modern elegance with a touch of luxury in every detail, its design is entirely in gold, with crystal details adding a soft feminine touch. Suitable for both formal and elegant casual looks, it's an ideal choice for anyone who loves shine and distinction in accessories.

products.title: Gold Zircon Tennis Bracelet
products.description: An elegant and sophisticated piece of jewelry that combines simplicity with an attractive shine. Crafted from shiny gold metal, it is studded with sparkling zircon beads that resemble diamonds in their brilliance, giving it a touch of luxury without being overpowering.

products.title: SVan Cleef necklace
products.description: A luxurious piece that captures the eye with its refined elegance and classic touch. Crafted from lustrous silver, it features a harmonious arrangement of ten beads in the iconic Alhambra design. Each bead is shaped like a four-leaf flower and is set with a green stone (often malachite or green agate), symbolizing luck and beauty.

products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: A thermal water bottle in light purple, featuring a white lid with a straw and a comfortable handle. Its sleek and modern design makes it perfect for carrying hot or cold drinks on the go.

products.title: Cartier Juste un Clou Ring
products.description: A stunning Cartier Juste un Clou ring crafted in yellow gold and accented with brilliant-cut diamonds. Inspired by a simple nail, this iconic piece combines edgy design with timeless elegance. Comes with the original Cartier box.

products.title: Dior package
products.description: An elegant and luxurious Dior gift set featuring a stunning designer handbag, presented in a signature Dior box and accompanied by the official Dior shopping bag. Perfect for gifting or personal .

products.title: Michael Kors Zip-Around Wallet
products.description: A stylish and compact Michael Kors zip-around wallet in a rich coffee brown color, featuring the iconic MK monogram design. Crafted for everyday elegance, it includes multiple card slots, a secure zip closure, and a chic gold-tone logo. Comes with the original MK box.

The smooth stone top in a sleek round shape offers a robust surface for your dining pleasure. Perfect for both everyday meals and special occasions, this table easily complements any modern or glam decor.
